Text.Page: Explore the passage and find Jelena.

After you defeated Kalligar, Rogash appeared and spirited him away.

You must find out what the Draakons are up to.

Did you feel that too?

It's him!

It's time to take our vengeance.

Hurry!

Damn it!
We couldn't finish him.

I'll go after Rogash.

I’ll do whatever it takes to get revenge.
You go and report back to Dougal.

I don't know what they’re up to, but they’re definitely doing something with the core.

This is disturbing news, .

We need to know more about what's going on.

We may even need help from Free Exodor!

. Head back to Jelena and gather whatever information you can.

I'll call you when I need you.
